description: Upgrade a PremiumDNS object to a higher class. There is a refund for the days that remain of the current validity period. The expiration date is reset according to the new validity period as provided in the command, but it may not be earlier than before the upgrade. If there was a prepayment for the PremiumDNS object, it is cancelled and refunded, too.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: PremiumDNS upgrade order action:CREATE - create a PremiumDNS upgrade orderREPLACE - replace a PremiumDNS upgrade orderUPDATE - update a PremiumDNS upgrade order
PremiumDNS upgrade order ID; only relevant if ORDER is REPLACE or UPDATE
Renewal mode for the PremiumDNS object; possible values:AUTORENEWAUTOEXPIREIf not specified, the renewal mode remains unchanged
